root: ^Oh, you startled me! I did not expect to see another climber around. My name's Rita.

c-1: ^Well that's not too nice! Be on your way then, careful you don't slip! Hmph.
^...Alright. The climb took its toll on you didn't it? Anyways,

met: ^Have you heard? They say there's all sorts of treasure at the top of this tower.
^Can't wait to get my hands on it.

c-0: ^If you can beat me to it!
^Of course, we can't be sure. There might not be anything at the top.
c-1: ^Hmm, looking for a challenge. I see. I'll give it to you, the sheer scale of this place is pretty intimidating.

part2: ^It's pretty chilly here isn't it? I think we're at least halfway there.
^I don't think it's gonna get any easier though. But you seem pretty well prepared! Got pitons and rope and everything!
^The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
^All I need is my bare hands!

c-0: ^Not very confident? I suppose the climb might get pretty dangerous from here on out.

part3: ^Who do you think built this tower?

c-0: ^A great wizard, eh? Well, it does have a certain mystical vibe to it, I guess.
^Might find some ancient magic artifact at the top then!
^Last one at the top misses his chance at ancient magic!
c-1: ^Oooh, a royal spire! What would a king put at the top of a tower...?
^Or a ton of gold! I want to buy my horse Lilith a new saddle. They got pretty expensive after the war, they don't import as many as they used to. Supply and demand and all that.

part3b: ^WOOW! Must have took a lot of effort! All these bricks and stuff, right?
^Could have opened the door with the key then. Would have saved us a lot of time.
^What did you hide at the top, oh great builder?

c-0: ^Well, they do say the real friends we made along the way is the destination, right?
c-1: ^I, Ser Rita shall rescue the princess and bring you to justice!
c-2: ^Ehh... the mysterious brooding type are we?

part4: ^Take a break here if you want. I'll stay here for a while longer. But don't you get cocky! I'll definetly beat you to the top!
